entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed '(intrinsicInfo.numArgs == -1) || (sig->numArgs == static_cast<uint8_t>(intrinsicInfo.numArgs))' during 'Morph - Inlining' (IL size 568; hash 0xb #105922
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ConfigurationBinder.GetRequiredValue<T>` #105919
  • Segmentation Fault while debugging #105917
  • Templates from Workload Disappear after VS Update #105916

Closed

  • Circular DI causes endless loop instead of exception #105900
  • `BasicEventSourceTests.TestsUserErrors.Test_BadEventSource_MismatchedIds_WithEtwListener` fails with `System.NullReferenceException` #105807
    Future
  • Test failure: NullReferenceException in Internal.JitInterface.CorInfoImpl._beginInlining #105441
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix105667alt #105921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[NativeAOT] Respect Align8 flag for thread statics" #105920
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid signed overflow in DBG_FlushInstructionCache #105918
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: Make sure static ctor flag check uses a volatile load #105832
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2508581 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix comments around static constructor memory #105911
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix over-shifting logic when constant-folding `AdvSimd.ShiftRight*` and `AdvSimd.ShiftLeft*` #105847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable x86 AOT compilation for components build #105909
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some core typeof(...) references #105903
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

  • NativeAOT publish for DLL does not set automatically RID #29834
  • Reduce the amount of work required to build apps for multiple platforms #42344
  • dotnet publish multiple -r options #6490
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quick info stopped working #74644

PullRequests

Created

Updated

    Area-Compilers, untriaged

  • Avoid optimizing away ref array access #74553

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes_spring, json_spring #57166
  • Perf regression: fortunes_spring, fortunes_spring, plaintext_spring #57165
  • Perf regression: json_spring, json_spring, plaintext_spring #57164

  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes, plaintext #57065
  • Perf improvement: https #57163
  • Perf regression: plaintext #57162

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Screenshots taken using IScreenshot.CaptureAsync don't include popups or visible alerts #23731
  • `HtmlWebViewSource` support for upcoming `HybridWebView` control #23908
    .NET 9 Planning
  • .NET Maui Secondary ToolbarItem Issue on Windows #18258
    Backlog
  • CollectionView is not updating SelectedItems bound property #8435
    Backlog
  • MAUI NET8.0 Android HTTPClient isn't working as intend, SendAsync() and GetAsync() send nothing. But works well on Windows #23993
  • Make WebView available in ScrollView. #14349
    Backlog
  • Space character in Webview's Source causes net::ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND error #23767
    Backlog
  • CollectionView Header and Footer not shown in Windows #21224
    Backlog
  • InitializeComponent () System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Binding' to type 'System.Boolean'. #23998
  • Maui Blazor Hybrid doesn't Import JavaScript When UseMaui is Enabled in RCL #23149

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button - fix #24003
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Space character in Webview's Source #24002
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨

Updated

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Update versions for iOS and sdk #23977
  • [net9.0] Bump to RC.1 #23967
    9.0-rc1
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨
  • [Android] Border Stroke gradient can only switch to another gradient - fix #22168
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • F# immutable Records do not work #34357
  • Auto-creation of DbSet does not work with F# properties #34356
  • Query/Test: when verifying translation error, force using AssertTranslationFailedWithDetails, when details are provided #34354
  • Improved logging support for efbundle #34353

Closed

  • Cosmos: NullReferenceException when projecting out an owned entity which doesn't own additional entity types #34068
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: bogus translation error (DbSet<JsonEntityBasic>()' could not be translated) when projecting a subquery starting from another DbSet #34352

PullRequests

Created

  • Promote Json tests to Core so that they can be utilized for Cosmos. #34355

Merged

  • Handle projections of nested owned entity in Cosmos #34315

Updated

  • Introduce UseAzureSynapse and UseAzureSql #34052
  • New EF.Constant handling #34297
